document_data.name: ''Glorious Revolution''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Glorious Revolutions''''' were [[enchanted]] [[heavy crossbow]]s that were used by the leaders of the [[Glorious Revolution]] in the early 13{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|You have nothing to lose but your [[chain]]s!|The rallying cry of the Glorious Revolution}}
document_data.Powers: These crossbows possessed a ''+2'' enchantment that made the [[weapon]] deadlier and guided its [[bolt]]s toward the target. It was especially effective at hitting [[evil]] creatures. Its [[magic]]s also increased the wielder's [[spell]] resistance.
document_data.History: These ranged weapons were used by the leaders of the Glorious Revolution, a popular uprising against the tyrannical Duke [[Bogob]] in the {{YearlinkName|1217}}. While the uprising failed, one such crossbow survived and was found on a corpse close to a [[glow spider]] nest in the [[Glowstone Caverns]], not far from [[Port Llast]] in the {{YearlinkName|1374}}.
